text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1953 Final was the 51st final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Estadio Chamartín in Madrid, on 21 June 1953, being won by CF Barcelona, who beat Atlético de Bilbao 2-1. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|CF Barcelona: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| Antoni Ramallets |- |DF ||2|| Josep Seguer |- |DF ||3|| Gustau Biosca |- |DF ||4|| Juan Segarra |- |MF ||5|| Isidre Flotats |- |MF ||6|| Mariano Gonzalvo (c) |- |FW ||7|| Estanislau Basora |- |FW ||8|| Andreu Bosch |- |FW ||9|| László Kubala |- |FW||10|| Moreno |- |FW||11|| Eduardo Manchón |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Ferdinand Daučík |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|Atlético de Bilbao: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || Carmelo Cedrún |- |DF ||2|| José María Orúe |- |DF ||3|| Serafín Areta |- |DF ||4|| Jesús Garay |- |MF ||5|| Manolín |- |MF ||6|| Canito |- |FW ||7|| Rafael Iriondo |- |FW ||8|| Venancio |- |FW ||9|| Telmo Zarra |- |FW||10|| José Luis Panizo (c) |- |FW||11|| Agustín Gaínza |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Antonio Barrios |- |} |} ==See also== *Athletic–Barcelona clásico ==References== 1953 Copa Category:FC Barcelona matches Category:Athletic Bilbao matches
title: 1953 Copa del Generalísimo Final
